title: Urban Office Complex
description: This adaptive reuse project transforms a historic warehouse into a modern creative office space while preserving its industrial character.
The design features flexible workspaces, collaborative areas, and sustainable technologies integrated into the existing structure.

floorPlans.caption: Modern interior with open plan design

gallery.caption: Evening view of illuminated contemporary building
Modern architecture with infinity pool and lawn
Pool deck with covered outdoor area
Executive suite with panoramic city views
